name: Edison Vehicles Marketing Department
description:
This is a casual social "game" where you are tasked by the Edison Vehicles company to design them a whole new brand and advertisement.

Edison Vehicles is a struggling electric car company that needs some help to market and promote themselves better! So they've handed off the task to the general public to see what people come up with! 

Using the game, you can:

  • Make a new brand name
  • Make a new slogan
  • Make a new logo
  • Make a new jingle
  • Design the advertisement by choosing music, sound effects, and lines of the scrip that the actors speak

Your ad will be submitted to a global database where others can watch it and give it a rating! May the best ad win and be selected for Edison Vehicles! You will have the satisfaction of knowing your ad was the winner!

Entries close 31/12/2032
